ExecutableTestSuite.label: csw again
ExecutableTestSuite.description: This test was generated automatically from a Schema profile in haleconnect
ExecutableTestSuite.author: admin admin

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestModule.label: Default test module
TestModule.description: This is the default test module

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_Metadata' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'language' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should not be empty if it's present
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $propertiesFound := $record//*[local-name()='MD_Metadata' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']/*[local-name()='language' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $propertyFound in $propertiesFound return if (($propertyFound[not(text())]) and ($propertyFound[not(node())])) then local:addMessage('TR.missingTypeContentError', map { 'localName': 'language', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'CI_OnlineResource' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The property with localName 'name' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a value that corresponds to one from the following list:
  • Bebauungspläne
TestAssertion.expression: let $codes := ('Bebauungspläne') let $messages := (for $record in $db let $typesFound := $record//*[local-name()='CI_OnlineResource' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $typeFound in $typesFound let $propertyFound := $typeFound/*[local-name()='name' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] return if ($propertyFound and not($propertyFound/text() = $codes)) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidPropertyValueError', map { 'propName': 'name', 'localName': 'CI_OnlineResource', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'valueFound': $propertyFound/text(), 'allowedValues': string-join( $codes, ', ') }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'CI_OnlineResource' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'description' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a minimum cardinality of 1 and a maximum cardinality of 1
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $typesFound := $record//*[local-name()='CI_OnlineResource' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'] for $typeFound in $typesFound let $propertyCount := count($typeFound/*[local-name()='description' and namespace-uri()='http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd']) return if (($propertyCount lt 1) or ($propertyCount gt 1)) then local:addMessage('TR.invalidPropertyCardinalityError', map { 'localName': 'CI_OnlineResource', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd', 'invalidCardinality': $propertyCount }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_BrowseGraphic' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The type with localName 'MD_BrowseGraphic' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should be present in the file

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_Keywords' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The property with localName 'type' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' should have a value that corresponds to one from the following list:
  • stratum
  • theme
  • discipline
  • place

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'MD_ScopeDescription' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description:
The type with localName 'MD_ScopeDescription' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd' must contain one and only one of the following options:
  • attributes
  • featureInstances
  • attributeInstances
  • dataset
  • other

TestAssertion.label: is theme
